hanzi-su-wiki:
剤

Значения

Лекарство, средство

Мнемоника

Ножом 刂 подравнивать стебли хлопчатника так, чтобы они стали одинаково ровными 斉. Позднее — крошить, составлять из трав лекарственные сборы.

Варианты

劑, 剂
purpleculture_pinyin:
jì
Japanese variant of 剂
Японский вариант агента
rtega_mnemonic:
劑劑RS
剤剤		dose, medicine, drug
  • cut 刂 medicine from a field of grain 齊/斉
heisig_constituent: dose, adjust, adjusted, sentence, plaid, kilt, Billy Connolly, two, fenceposts, cabers, sword, sabre, saber
heisig_story: Adjust . . . saber. Think of this as a dose of medicine.
koohiiStory1: When my medicine dose is way too large, I adjust it by cutting it into smaller pieces with my saber.
koohiiStory2: We had to adjust his dose slightly, after he went on a rampage with a sabre.
jp_example_words: 洗剤(せんざい): detergent, washing material
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Simultaneously, you throw your knife at another person who's throwing a knife at you and you both get a dose of your own medicine. Literally, there's poison on these knives and now you've both been stabbed.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Watch as the dose of poison sinks into your body through the knife that's in your chest, as it simultaneously happens to the other guy too.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: "I need a dose of the antidote!" you yell, and the other guy looks you dead in the eyes. They slowly pull a tiny xylophone (ざい) out of their pocket, play a few notes, and then eat it. "Ah, you'd like a dose of the xylophone cure, wouldn't you?"
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now you're begging them for a dose of the xylophone drug. Just a taste, you want to live!

jì
яп. вм. 剂
Radicals: 斉, 刂  (simultaneous, knife)
Meaning Mnemonic
Simultaneously, you throw your knife at another person who's throwing a knife at you and you both get a dose of your own medicine. Literally, there's poison on these knives and now you've both been stabbed.
Watch as the dose of poison sinks into your body through the knife that's in your chest, as it simultaneously happens to the other guy too.
Reading Mnemonic
"I need a dose of the antidote!" you yell, and the other guy looks you dead in the eyes. They slowly pull a tiny xylophone (ざい) out of their pocket, play a few notes, and then eat it. "Ah, you'd like a dose of the xylophone cure, wouldn't you?"
Now you're begging them for a dose of the xylophone drug. Just a taste, you want to live!
